name: Sparkle Panda Rainbow Hunter
description:
Blast BAD MOODS with SPARKLE PANDA RAINBOW HUNTER !!

The skys are all dark and there are no more rainbows. The BAD MOODS have taken over. Panda has decided to do something about it. Join her journey and become SPARKLE PANDA RAINBOW HUNTER !! 

 Figure out what happened. Make your way through the BAMBOO FOREST to the CLOUD CASTLE. Discover its many secrets!! There will be challenges along the way. We know you can do it!! Watch out for BAD MOODS! They're all over the place!
